feed.title: Tetsa River (Provincial Park) - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Tetsa River (Provincial Park)
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Thursday: Snow. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning early this morning and ending this afternoon then 30 percent chance of flurries later this afternoon. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 early this afternoon. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 19 this morning and minus 9 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 10. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 40 percent chance of flurries late in the afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h in the afternoon. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Thursday 09 February 2023
